Description: Start your engineering legend! Gather the magical Andesite Alloy that powers all things Create.
Shafts: the backbone of every wacky machine! Collect a handful and get things spinning.
Big or small, cogwheels make the world go 'round. Build a set and watch the gears turn!
Supersize your motion! Large cogwheels are perfect for big, bold builds.
Wrap your machines in style with sturdy Andesite Casings. Fashion and function!
Hand cranks: for when you just need to give things a little push. Get cranking!
Mechanical bearings: for spinning entire contraptions! Let’s get dizzy.
Clockwork bearings: spin on a schedule and impress your friends!
Radial chassis: the secret to round-and-round fun. Build one and stick your contraption together!
Linear chassis: perfect for making machines move in a straight line. All aboard!
Super Glue: stick your blocks together and never worry about things falling apart again.
Cart Assemblers: build your own mini rollercoaster of moving machines!
Up
Reward(s): Rope pulleys: for all your elevator and drawbridge dreams.

Description: Mechanical Press: flatten, smash, and impress your friends with shiny new sheets.
Make iron and copper sheets for shiny, high-tech builds. Sheet-tastic!
Task (Item & Quantity): Iron Sheet x4, Copper Sheet x1
Reward(s): Iron Sheet x4, Fermented Spider Eye x2

Description: Brass sheets: the golden ticket to advanced machinery.
Gold sheets: for when you want your machines to really shine.
Start your fluid engineering journey with pipes and pumps. Splish splash!
Task (Item & Quantity): Fluid Pipe x8, Mechanical Pump x1
Reward(s): Cuckoo Clock x1, Slime Ball x4

Description: Take control! Fluid valves let you direct the flow like a true conductor.
Reward(s): Green Valve Handle x1, Red Valve Handle x1

Description: Smart pipes: for when you want your fluids to think for themselves.
Fluid tanks: store all the juice your machines need!
Spouts: fill bottles, buckets, or anything you want with style!
Hose pulleys: move fluids up, down, and all around. Splash zone ahead!
Mix and match with the Mechanical Mixer and Basin. Concoct something amazing!
Automate everything! Deployers and Mechanical Crafters are your new best friends.
Build a full crafting array and become a master of automation!
Mechanical Harvesters: reap what you sow, automatically!
Mechanical Saws: chop wood the easy way (and impress the neighbors).
Mechanical Drills: dig, mine, and tunnel like a pro. No pickaxe required!
Reward(s): Cogwheel x4, Sheep Spawn Egg x1

Description: Millstones: grind your way to success (and flour).
Encased Fans: blow, wash, and process your way to cleaner resources.
Blaze Burners: for recipes that are too hot to handle!
Funnels and chutes: move items with style and efficiency.
Task (Item & Quantity): Andesite Funnel x1, Brass Funnel x1, Chute x4
Reward(s): Melon Seeds x8, Totem of Undying x1

Description: Gearboxes: redirect power and keep your machines in sync.
Vertical gearboxes: power up, power down, power all around!
Portable Storage Interfaces: pass items between contraptions like magic!
Sequenced Gearshifts: automate complex moves and dance like a robot.
Rotation Speed Controllers: go fast, go slow, go pro!
Precision Mechanisms: the secret sauce for super-advanced machines.
Mechanical Arms: sort, grab, and move items like a boss.
Extendo Grip: reach for the stars (or just that faraway block).
Brass Tunnels: split and filter items on belts-no traffic jams here!
Item Vaults: store all the loot your machines make!
Packages: bundle up and ship out your items with style!
Redstone Links: send signals through the air like a techno-mage.
Transmitters: broadcast your redstone genius to the world.
Display Links: show off your machine stats and look smart doing it.
Threshold Switches: automate with perfect timing and precision.
Contraption Controllers: the brains behind every moving marvel.
Train Tracks: lay the foundation for your railway empire!
Train Signals: keep your trains on time and on track.
Train Observers: detect trains and automate your railway like a pro.
Train Stations: where all great journeys begin (and end).
Train Schedules: automate deliveries and become a railway tycoon!
Weathered Iron, Cherry Windows, Sliding Doors: make your base the envy of every engineer.
Task (Item & Quantity): Weathered Iron Block x1, Cherry Window x1, Sliding Door x1

Description: Catwalks: strut your stuff and stay safe above the factory floor.
Catwalk Railings: don’t fall off your stylish walkways!
Catwalk Stairs: climb to new heights in industrial fashion.
Cage Lamps: light up your world with industrial flair.
Sheet Metal: walls, floors, and more-shine on!
Support Blocks: keep your builds standing tall.
Support Wedges: for angled, awesome architecture.
Chain Link Fences: keep things contained, look cool doing it.
Bars: for windows, cages, and that industrial vibe.
Opaque Paneled Bars: solid, secure, and sleek.
Coin Stacks: show off your riches!
Shipping Containers: store your stuff in style.
Industrial Windows: let the light in, keep the style out.
Window Panes: for all your factory’s fine details.
Metal Doors: security and style, all in one swing.
Metal Ladders: reach new heights with industrial flair.
Decals: mark hazards, decorate, or just look awesome.
Red Bricks: classic color for classic builds.
Blue Bricks: cool color for cool builds.
Scarlet Bricks: bold
Umber Bricks: earthy tones for grounded builds.
